data.title: My Name Is Earl Cast
data.text:
Jason Lee

as Earl Hickey

Birthday: April 20, 1970

Place of Birth: Huntington Beach, California

Marital Status: engaged with a son named Pilot Inspektor Riesgraf

Eduation: Ocean View High School (dropped out to be a pro skateboarder)

Other Trivia: Jason has also been credited under the names Dennis Pepper and Linus Peacock. At one time he owned a race car school and was a professional skateboarder. Some of Jason's hobbies include; fly fishing in Florida, watching comedies & cartoons, writing music, playing guitar and collecting art. His pet dog as a kid was named "dog" and Cameron Crow refers to him as the "poster boy for casual ambition". Some of Jason's favorites include; book - Ham on Rye, tv shows - King of the Hill and South Park, movie - Amadeus, actor - Burt Reynolds, and band - Sigur Ros. He is a follower of Scientology.
